description: Consumers report making fewer, quicker trips to supermarkets for a narrower range of groceries — and that is steering some people toward unhealthy eating habits.
content: Americans are spending more, yet increasingly they are being offered fewer choices, both online and in person, slowing a years-long trend toward innovations that put good for you and environmentally … [+11657 chars]
source.name: The Washington Post
